sentences.english: The next station is BEIYUAN. Please get ready for your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 列车运行前方是北苑站，下车的乘客请提前做好准备。

definition: Nanyuan or "Southern Park", an imperial hunting domain during the Yuan, Ming and Qing Dynasties, now the site of Nanhaizi Park in the south of Beijing
Shuangqia suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Qiaoxi District (various)/Qiaoxi District of Shijiazhuang City 石家莊市|石家庄市[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 Shi4], Hebei
Haidian inner district of northeast Beijing, includes Peking University, Tsinghua University 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 da4 xue2] and Zhongguancun 中關村|中关村[Zhong1 guan1 cun1]
Yuquan District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
Changping district of Beijing, formerly Changping county
Gaobeidian county level city in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei
abbr. for 國際貿易|国际贸易[guo2 ji4 mao4 yi4]
Shunyi district of Beijing, formerly Shunyi county
